title: Dark Melody
description: Raven tries to drown his emotions in the tune of rhymes and music. When his parents were alive they would put the blame on him no matter who caused the problem. Raven has been insulted in every single way you could think of. Those words haunt him day and night. They sink into his soul and twist round until his breathing sharpens.He's shattered, a broken 18-year-old walking down the street of life with a dark melody calling out to him.Quentin sees Raven take the same route every day. Heâ€™s radiating depression that even a stranger can see. Quentin makes it his mission to save Raven from the shadows of his past before something truly bad happens to Raven.
author: Rito Lacota
